title: Artyom Shmykov
text:
Artyom Mikhailovich Shmykov (; born 8 January 2002) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="centre-back">centre-back</a> for <a href="FC%20Ural-2%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural-2 Yekaterinburg</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Nizhny Novgorod</a> on 30 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Tekstilshchik%20Ivanovo">FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo</a>.
On 22 June 2021, he signed a long-term contract with <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> club <a href="FC%20Ural%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural Yekaterinburg</a> and assigned to the <a href="FC%20Ural-2%20Yekaterinburg">second squad</a> in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League%202">third-tier FNL 2</a>.
